name: another dark scheme
description:
a color scheme for dark and fuzzy backgrounds, i made it because i thought "desert" was too boring.
open-source
have fun.
install_details:
move to /usr/share/vim/vim6*/colors/anotherdark.vim
get it by typing:
:colorscheme anotherdark
(you can use the tab-key for fast-replacement)
if you want to use it permanently, add the line "colorscheme anotherdark" at the bottom of your vimrc file (normally ~/.vimrc)
have fun

versions.release_notes: corrected the error in line 22 (it was not a fatal error)
